name: ~necromancy~Emily's Escape
description: [~necromancy~Emily's Escape] is a 2D ACT game.Use your wisdom to escape the Necromancer's claws in intense battles and chases. Tell the Adventures Guild about the news of the death of the Necromancer!Can you crack the conspiracy of the Necromancer? Fight now!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
